channel.title: Compiler
channel.description: Okay so I've spent almost 2 hours trying to find a compiler that would work with the 641 server i got and fixed, all thats left is compiling and i can't find a compiler for a dragonkk server ANYWHERE. If anyone can help me find one, that would be amazingly pro. :D

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

[quote=“Dclawrushz, post:3, topic:397216”]I’m pretty sure the compiler works… You just need to change the JDK to yours… For an example.

Click “Compliler” Click “Edit”

It says in the middle /jdk1.6.0_20/ Change the 20 to your JDK. Your JDK is most likely 24 or 20. If it isn’t try others!

If you go to your PROGRAM FILES in :C find Java and click it and the first JDK is your JDK try that number!

Sorry for the bad english just woke up![/quote][quote=“Dclawrushz, post:3, topic:397216”]I’m pretty sure the compiler works… You just need to change the JDK to yours… For an example.

Click “Compliler” Click “Edit”

It says in the middle /jdk1.6.0_20/ Change the 20 to your JDK. Your JDK is most likely 24 or 20. If it isn’t try others!

If you go to your PROGRAM FILES in :C find Java and click it and the first JDK is your JDK try that number!

Sorry for the bad english just woke up![/quote]
also im using a 641, and it didn’t come with a compiler, so i had to manually make one, its not working… :’(

thanks guys but my JDK is 25, and i also tried everything i know, it keeps saying “system cannot find path specified”

**EDIT: heres what im using for the Compiler

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -classpath lib/netty-3.1.5.GA -d bin src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\com\*.javac src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\content\*.javac src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\events\*.javac src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\gui\*.javac src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\io\*.javac src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\net\*.javac src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\rscache\*.javac src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\rsobjects\*.javac src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\scripts\*.javac src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\skills\*.javac src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\tools\*.javac src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\update\*.javacc src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\util\*.javac src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\world\*.javac src\dragonkk\*.javac src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\*.javac pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Dclawrushz Dclawrushz
item.description:
@Dclawrushz wrote:

I’m pretty sure the compiler works… You just need to change the JDK to yours… For an example.

Click “Compliler” Click “Edit”

It says in the middle /jdk1.6.0_20/ Change the 20 to your JDK. Your JDK is most likely 24 or 20. If it isn’t try others!

If you go to your PROGRAM FILES in :C find Java and click it and the first JDK is your JDK try that number!

Sorry for the bad english just woke up!

Read full topic

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Redemtion:

Okay so I’ve spent almost 2 hours trying to find a compiler that would work with the 641 server i got and fixed, all thats left is compiling and i can’t find a compiler for a dragonkk server ANYWHERE. If anyone can help me find one, that would be amazingly pro.

javac is the only compiler you need.
